mapper.select: select rownum,ta.* from(select A.*,B.SUB_NAME,B.TARGET_SUBJECT,B.TARGET_GRADE,B.COMPLETE_PT,B.SUB_TYPE,B.DEPT_CODE, B.SUB_DATE,B.SUB_TIME,B.SUB_ROOM,B.SUB_YEAR,B.SUB_SEMESTER,P.PROF_NAME,P.EMAIL,P.GENDER,P.PROF_ENROLL,P.PROF_IMG, D.DEPT_NAME,D.DEPT_OPEN,SUB_REQ.STU_NO from hd_class_tb A join hd_subject_tb B on a.sub_seq = b.sub_seq join hd_professor_tb p on a.prof_id = p.prof_id join HD_DEPARTMENT_TB d on p.dept_code = d.dept_code LEFT JOIN (select R.STU_NO,r.sub_seq from hd_class_tb A join hd_sub_req_tb r on a.sub_seq=r.sub_seq WHERE R.stu_no=#{stuId})SUB_REQ ON SUB_REQ.SUB_seq=a.sub_seq order by sub_year desc , sub_semester desc )ta
